revised_title: Intra-vitam Staining: A New Method for Examining Tissues
tldr: The author describes a new method of examining normal and diseased tissues using intra-vitam staining. This technique involves injecting dyes into animals and observing the staining of their tissues. The author discusses the optimal staining methods, doses, and techniques for different animals and dyes, as well as the applications of this method in various fields of study, such as tuberculosis research and connective tissue analysis.
